entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
